description: The UR10 is a collaborative robot (cobot) arm developed by Universal Robots. The UR10 has a payload capacity of 10 kilograms (22 pounds) and a reach of 1300 millimeters (51.2 inches).

actions.name: move_to
actions.description: Moves the robot arm above a specified object.

actions.name: open_gripper
actions.description: Opens the gripper attached to the robot arm.

actions.name: close_gripper
actions.description: Closes the gripper attached to the robot arm.

actions.name: pick_and_place
actions.description: Picks up an object and place it next to another one. By using this action, you don't need to use the move_to and open/close_gripper actions separately.

parameters.description: [object to pick name, destination object name]
